Title: QTest - C# port of fitnesse server
Description:
C# port of Fitnesse Server (visit for more info: fitnesse.org)

Goals:   
  Offline running of fitnesse cases 
  Smooth integration with continuous builds
  MsBuild targets, and MsTest integration for code coverage
  Server based implemenation for team operation(possibly with iisexpress)
  Integration with version control
  Support for classic and slim version of fitnesse
